name: SIEMME 2016
tagline: The 22nd China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics
body: SIEMME 2016, also _the 22nd China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics_, is about to be held at the Hotel of [_Element Suzhou Science and Technology Town (Element Hotel)_](http://www.starwoodhotels.com/element/property/overview/index.html?propertyID=3967&language=en_US) in Suzhou city on September 22-24, 2016. [Southeast University](http://www.seu.edu.cn) (China) and [Tokyo University of Science](http://www.tus.ac.jp) (Japan) will organize the symposium together. Over 200 attendees from 36 academic or industrical affiliations will spread their new ideas on 3 topic sections with [5 plenary talks](#pt), 36 invited talks, 50 oral talks and 100 posters. ## plenary talks | | | | ---- | ---- | | ![Akira Fujishima](images/fujishima.jpg) | [**Akira Fujishima**][fujishima] *Tokyo University of Science*. Recent Progress in Photocatalysis International Research Center. | | ![Lei Jiang](images/jiang.jpg)| [**Lei Jiang**][jiang] *CAS*. Smart Interfacial Materials from Super-Wettability to Binary Cooperative Complementary Systems. | | ![Kazuhiro Hashimoto](images/hashimoto.jpg) | [**Kazuhiro Hashimoto**][hashimoto] *NIMS*. Challenges/Priorities in Japan around Advanced Materials Science and Engineering. | | ![Yanling Song](images/song.jpg) | [**Yanling Song**][song] *CAS*. Nanomaterial green printing based on surface wettability manipulation. | [fujishima]: http://www.sut.ac.jp/en/initiatives/vol01 [jiang]: http://jianglei.iccas.ac.cn [hashimoto]: http://www.nims.go.jp/nims/ [song]: http://ylsong.iccas.ac.cn
